places.name: Aburi Botanical Gardens
places.description: A beautiful and peaceful garden filled with rare tropical plants and towering trees.

places.name: Boti Waterfalls
places.description: A twin waterfall surrounded by lush green vegetation and scenic hiking trails.

places.name: Kakum National Park
places.description: Famous for its canopy walkway suspended high above the rainforest floor.

places.name: Elmina Castle
places.description: A historical fort representing the early colonial era and transatlantic history.

places.name: Cape Coast Beach
places.description: A popular spot for relaxation with golden sands and calm ocean waves.
